author: jmsnell
msg: Applied patch included in bug report

author: gdaniels
msg: Allow dynamic registration of TypeDescs for given classes.
1) Registration is per-JVM (static), not per engine - is this OK?
2) Potential Classloader problems?  Should we be doing this by
class name and not Class object?

author: gdaniels
msg: Explicitly test message-style default namespace echoing.  Confirms

author: gdaniels
msg: A start at fixing problems with mulitple schema versions.  Make sure that
the correct SchemaVersion gets associated with a message context
when deserializing, by assuming that the first schema namespace
declaration we see is the base schema version for this interaction.
